name: Hunter
description: It's spicy pizza. Before you try this pizza you have to think twice.

name: 4-cheese
description: I hope you understand what it means. Pizza incorporates four types of cheese. They are mozzarella,emmental,parmesan and gorgonzola.

name: Hawaiian
description: If you want something exotic, then this pizza is for you. It's consist of pineapple and chicken.

name: pepperoni
description: It's kind of pizza with tasty sausage what is also called peperoni.

name: Vegetarian
description: Tasty pizza without meat. But it's not vegan so you can enjoy delicious cheese with mushrooms.
